transcript: I don't think people should or shouldn't do anything if they want to make more money then you optimize for the vehicle that will make you the most money and then you do that the whole passion piece teases out the psychology of humans because if you're just looking at first principles of what has to happen build a business that has the highest leverage that has the highest total adjustable Market that has Highest Potential growth profit per customer and do that that's what you would need to do if you wanted to make the most money as soon as you add in the psychology of humans when you get tired of this when do you lose interest in it the big thing for me at least is that I love business as long as I'm doing business I'm good and so the nature of the business doesn't matter I would say a lot of entrepreneurs are that way
